name: df-bj-inftyexpitau
body: |- wceq(cinftyexpitau, cmpt(s0, cr, cop(cfv(cfractemp, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), csn(cnr))))
comment: Definition of the auxiliary function ` inftyexpitau ` parameterizing the circle at infinity ` CCinfty ` in ` CCbar ` . We use coupling with ` { R. } ` to simplify the proof of ~ bj-inftyexpitaudisj . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jan-2023.) The precise definition is irrelevant and should generally not be used. TODO: prove only the necessary lemmas to prove ` |- ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( inftyexpitau `` A ) = ` ` ( inftyexpitau `` B ) <-> ( A - B ) e. ZZ ) ) ` . (New usage is discouraged.)
